title: Riot i have a problem
body: When i was in queue i found a match and everyone agreed i was waiting for the champ select but its just black screen

replies.body: I believe mostly it's the fault of Adobe AIR.... I have wished for a long loooooong time that they'd program mac and pc titles according to the platform, instead of using a buggy Adobe AIR platform.

Your best bet, if this happens during a ranked game, that causes you to lose LP, is to take a screenshot of it, submit a ticket with the screenshots (maybe even i video of what's happening, and ask Riot to refund your LP. If you're in a series the might even remove the loss in your series, but for that to truly matter you would have to not play league until that is resolved.... so.... yeah.

Yeah that's a bug in the client. Because it's nigh impossible to replicate, and happens insanely seldomly, in IT terms it doesn't happen enough to be a problem, and it can't be reproduced so good luck getting a patch that fixes it.
